comments: The UV absorption spectrum of 4H4M2P in the gas phase was measured using a deuterium lamp plus monochromator and photomultiplier (PM) device (spectral resolution 0.1 nm)
name: 4-hydroxy-4-methyl-2-pentanone , 4H4M2P, diacetone alcohol

comments: Absorption measurents using a Zn pen-ray lamp and a photodiode with a filter at 213.8 nm
name: 4-hydroxy-4-methyl-2-pentanone , 4H4M2P, diacetone alcohol

comments: The collimated output of a deuterium lamp passed through an absorption cell and was focused onto the entrance slit of a spectrograph equipped with a 1800 grooves/mm grating, which dispersed the radiation onto a 1024 element diode array detector (resolution 0.04 nm)
name: 4-hydroxy-4-methyl-2-pentanone , 4H4M2P, diacetone alcohol

comments: Absorption measurents using a Hg pen-ray lamp and a photodiode with a filter at 254 nm
name: 4-hydroxy-4-methyl-2-pentanone , 4H4M2P, diacetone alcohol
